greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fine's numbers J(n).
reference: N. J. Fine, Basic Hypergeometric Series and Applications, Amer. Math. Soc., 1988; p. 62, Eq. (27.1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
L. A. Dragonette, Some Asymptotic Formulae for the Mock Theta Series of Ramanujan, Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 72 (1952), 474-500. See page 496.
mathematica: a[n_]:= SeriesCoefficient[Sum[(-1)^k*q^((3*k^2 + k)/2)/(1 + q^k), {k, 1, 2*nmax}], {q,0,n}]; Table[a[n], {n,0,50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 18 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, polcoeff( sum(k=1, (sqrtint(24*n + 1) - 1) \ 6, (-1)^k * x^((3*k^2 + k)/2) / (1 + x^k), x * O(x^n)), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 13 2006 */
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 15 2004
